entries.next: Your service to the Empire has been noted. I have nothing further for you at this time. Perhaps you should speak with Captain Pellaeon.
entries.cantwork: You have a job at the moment. See me once you've finished it.
entries.npc_reset: Check back later if you want to finish what you started.
entries.notyet: Speak to Captain Pellaeon.  I'm sure he has some work for you.  Come back to me later.
entries.npc_1_1: So you want to serve the Empire and prove yourself, eh? I might have just the task for you. There's an informant we use, Dina Whisper. We suspect she's selling sensitive information to the Rebels. Would you bring her to us for questioning?
entries.npc_2_1: Always a pleasure to see people take an interest in the welfare of the Empire. You'll be looking for Dina Whisper. Keep an eye open -- you don't want her Rebel pals getting the drop on you.
entries.npc_3_1: Suddenly not so keen to serve the Empire? What was your name again?
entries.npc_4_1: I'm sure she's picking up interesting information in her dealings with us. Too bad she can't be trusted. I hope we won't have that problem with you. So, interested?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Were you going to arrest that traitor?
entries.npc_reward_1: Good work, citizen. The Empire appreciates your service.
entries.npc_work_1: Arresting traitors to the Empire is your number-one priority right now. Get moving!
entries.npc_noloc_1: Once we find her current location I'll send you on your way. Check back with me soon.
entries.npc_failure_1: She eluded your grasp? She's more clever than I thought.
entries.otherescort_1: I'm not the person you need to find.
entries.npc_takeme_1: Don't hurt me. I'll go quietly.
entries.npc_dropoff_1: This can't be happening to me.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.npc_1_2: Very interesting information we picked up from that arrest you made. Apparently there's a small black-market outpost operating outside of town. How about taking care of the people who run it?
entries.npc_2_2: I never doubted you for a moment. We can't allow an operation like this to continue.
entries.npc_3_2: Thinking about those illegal goods, are you? I hope you don't get hurt when we take care of these guys.
entries.npc_4_2: Don't get cute. They sell information and weapons to the Rebels, so unless you plan on treason to the Empire, stick to the job at hand. Will you take out those running the outpost?
entries.npc_backtowork_2: Have you changed your mind about the mission?
entries.npc_reward_2: Well done, citizen. Your next step is to speak with Captain Pellaeon. He may have further work for you.
entries.npc_work_2: Were you planning to take care of that black-market outpost soon?
entries.npc_noloc_2: As soon as I've confirmed the exact location with our agents I'll be ready for you. See me again in a few minutes.
entries.npc_failure_2: If it was that difficult, perhaps more drastic measures will be needed.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_3_2: Do they have anything I can use?
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_4: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_4: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_5: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_5: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_6: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_6: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.npc_reset_1: Check back later if you want to finish what you started.
entries.npc_reset_2: Check back later if you want to finish what you started.
entries.npc_reset_3: Check back later if you want to finish what you started.
